title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4626.10 - Procedure prescribed for the commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4626.10 - Procedure prescribed for the commission

State Regulations

When proceedings respecting the suspension or revocation
of licenses or identification numbers or imposition of fines are begun before
the commission, it shall dispose of the proceedings in the same manner as in
the case of an appeal from a determination or action of the municipal governing
body. Both the licensee and the governing body issuing the license shall be
notified immediately in writing of the decision and, in the event of a
suspension, revocation or fine, the effective date thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4626.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
